## Bio

Hi!

I am Dany, Member of Computational Biology Team at Firalis in Huningue since 2023. I am currently pursuing a Phd program funded by Marie CuMarie Skłodowska-Curie Actions at The University of Côte d'Azur in Nice, France.

My Research consists of identifying and validating body fluid biomarkers for early-onset Alhzeimer's disease.
